description:
## Setup Sales Tax Accounts

Sales Tax Accounts are the basis for FBR tax compliance and reporting. The following accounts are required:

1. Sales tax on goods
2. Sales tax on services
3. Further tax
4. Extra tax

### Add your registration numbers to Company Master

Add your company NIC number or NTN and STRN numbers.
name: Create Sales Tax Accounts
title: Create Sales Tax Accounts in Company Master
